ComicInfo.Summary:
Dane dives on the spot his ancestor lost the ship "Honor" to the pirate Black Shark without firing a single shot.
The Sea Devils travel back in time and help save ancient Greece from a Persian navy.
The Sea Devils discover the secret of the Mary Celeste.

ComicInfo.Title: The Secrets of 3 Sunken Ships! [Part 1]; The Secrets of 3 Sunken Ships! Part Two!; The Secrets of 3 Sunken Ships! Part Three -- Conclusion!; Sea Waves
